titles.title: Expressing the profound sorrow of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Jackie Walorski.
Expressing the profound sorrow of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Jackie Walorski.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
This resolution expresses that the House of Representatives has heard with profound sorrow of the death of the Honorable Jackie Walorski, a Representative from Indiana.
The resolution also expresses that the House has heard with profound sorrow of the death of Zachery Potts and Emma Thomson, staff members of Representative Walorski.
Finally, the resolution expresses that when the House adjourns today, it is adjourned as a further mark of respect to the memory of those deceased.
